meanings.definition: A list of items to be checked or accomplished.
meanings.sent1: I always keep my checklisted for grocery shopping to make sure I don't forget anything.
meanings.sent2: The teacher handed out a checklisted to each student before the science experiment.
meanings.sent3: The checklisted for packing my suitcase was so long, I almost needed a bigger bag!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a messy desk, with thoughts scattered everywhere, waiting to be organized into a neat checklisted.
meanings.sent5: The checklisted for planning a wedding was overwhelming, but it helped keep everything on track.

meanings.definition: Having been added to a checklist.
meanings.sent1: The checklisted items were highlighted in yellow to show they were completed.
meanings.sent2: She proudly displayed her checklisted badge after finishing all the tasks.
meanings.sent3: The checklisted cupcakes were the first to disappear at the party.
meanings.sent4: His checklisted tasks were like trophies, showing his progress and achievements.
meanings.sent5: The checklisted boxes on the form indicated the necessary steps had been taken.
